title: Wash your hands properly with soap and water for 20 seconds
description: Use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer if water and soap are not available.

title: Cover your nose and mouth with a tissue when you cough or sneeze
description: Dispose of tissue immediately after using. Cough and sneeze into the crook of your elbow if you do not have a tissue

title: Avoid touching your face
description: Don't touch your eyes, nose or mouth wiht your hands to avoid getting infected.

title: Avoid Shaking Hands
description: Avoid shaking hands, kissing people hello and unnecessary contact with people in public.

title: Stay home if you are ill
description: Avoid close contact with people who have flu-like symptoms or if you are feeling sick.

title: Clean your mobile devices
description: Clean your mobile devices using a wipe with 70% alcohol at least four (4) times daily.

title: No more than 25 people
description: Do not gather in groups of more than 25 people. Avoid unnecessary contact.
